actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The ape makes two Fist attacks.

actions.name: Fist
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +9, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 22 (3d10 + 6) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Boulder Toss (Recharge 6)
actions.description: The ape hurls a boulder at a point it can see within 90 feet. *Dexterity Saving Throw:* DC 17, each creature in a 5-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point. *Failure:* 24 (7d6) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition. *Success:* Half damage only.

bonusActions.name: Leap
bonusActions.description: The ape jumps up to 30 feet by spending 10 feet of movement.
